alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 1:20PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Seminole, Orange and northern Osceola Counties through 200 PM EST... At 119 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Orlovista to near Four Corners to Auburndale. Movement was east northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Altamonte Springs, Ocoee and Winter Garden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for east central Florida.
